record.dc:title: 9BN3 Danville Ferry Site 1BN3, Benton Co., Tennessee. Feature 3, Pile of flint spalls, probably bottom of pit. Square 47L1. Direction north.
record.wpa:narrative: On area, bottom of a pit (guess) filled with flint chips, spall, etc. Pit must have originated in the middle which lies directly on the sand - about 7.0 to 7.5.
